name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Name instead of ID for ENGIE GitHub

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display full name instead of GAIA/Okta ID for ENGIE GitHub Enterprise instance

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension to display full-name instead of GAIA/Okta ID for ENGIE's GitHub Enterprise instance.

This extensions requires the permissions to read and change your data on Github to be able to replace the User Ids with real names on those sites. The change is done in the Frontend and the names are read from the Github profile.

Please feel free to check the source code or improve the Extension on Github: https://github.tools.digital.engie.com/CN5868/okta-to-name-chrome-extension
